solution_line_template: After the birds ate {tomatoes_eaten} of the tomatoes Haruto has {total_tomatoes} - {tomatoes_eaten} = <<{total_tomatoes}-{tomatoes_eaten}={tomatoes_left}>>{tomatoes_left} tomatoes left.
After giving half of his tomatoes to his friend, Haruto had {tomatoes_left} / {divisor} = <<{tomatoes_left}/{divisor}={tomatoes_after_giving}>>{tomatoes_after_giving} tomatoes.
